name: simian.interface++
description: simian.interface++ is an abstract puzzle experience for simian participants of all ages and abilities. There are no explicit rules, no instructions, and very simple controls. Puzzles must be solved using pattern recognition, intuition, and experimentation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Standard audio

reviews.review_text: It's a bit like playing with a Rubik's Cube or Homberman Switch Pitch Ball in the Matrix. This game is really a joy. Great procedural levels and music (?!). Plenty of desktop wallpaper fodder if you're quick the the screenshot hotkey. I love the subtle humor as well. Do yrself a favor and pick up this hidden gem.
I'm not sure why but this game is strangely pleasant.  Cheap, relaxing, and really really nice replay value.
Absolutely wonderful game. Very short puzzle game, amazing meditation on player action and feedback in games. It feels exactly right.
pretty good and there are not many puzzle games so just buy it
